channel.title: Extremities
channel.description:
Why and how people live in earth's most isolated and extreme settlements.
Season 2 starts in late September 2019.
A Wendover Productions podcast: http://WendoverProductions.com
channel.author: Wendover Productions
channel.itunes:author: Wendover Productions
channel.itunes:summary:
Why and how people live in earth's most isolated and extreme settlements.
Season 2 starts in late September 2019.
A Wendover Productions podcast: http://WendoverProductions.com

item.title: Pyramiden: The High-Arctic Soviet Ghost Town - S02 E04
item.description:
20 years ago, what was previously the Soviet Union's model town in the high arctic closed for good. Today, though, it's slowly being revitalized.
This episode was supported by: Dashlane: Stay safe online by using Dashlane's package of security tools. Try Dashlane premium for free for 30-days by signing up at http://Dashlane.com/extremities and the use the code, "extremities," for 10% off upgrading to premium

item.title: How Pitcairn Works - S01 E04
item.description:

item.title: Pitcairn's Beginning, Boat, and Bureaucracy - S01 E02
item.description:
The HMS Bounty arrives and creates a new society. We explain Pitcairn's supply ship, its connection to New Zealand, its political status, the outsiders on Pitcairn, and much more.
